H1.text: who is the president of the european union 2012. José Manuel Barroso

H2.text: who is the president of the european union 2012. Herman Van Rompuy

H3.text: who is the president of the european union 2012. Jerzy Buzek

A4.text: On 1 March 2012, Van Rompuy was re-elected unanimously as President of the European Council by the heads of state or government of the 28 EU member states.
